siteMetadata.author: SÃ©bastien Dubois
quotes: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness.
Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
Develop a passion for learning. If you do, you will never cease to grow.
Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
You can do anything as long as you have the passion, the drive, the focus, and the support.
Once something is a passion, the motivation is there.
When you catch a glimpse of your potential, that's when passion is born.
Go out into the world with your passion and love for what you do, and just never give up.
Never give up, have the passion. Don't be afraid.
Whatever you're fighting for, you go with full passion and love.
It is your passion that empowers you to be able to do that thing you were created to do.
Passion is what gets you through the hardest times that might otherwise make strong men weak, or make you give up.
The presence of passion within you is the greatest gift you can receive. Treat it as a miracle.
We all have a gift; we all have a passion. It's just about finding it and going into it.
Anything is possible as long as you have the passion.
No matter what, you've got to always follow your passion in life and always keep learning.
Work hard! In the end, passion and hard work beats out natural talent.
